channel.title: The Basement Internet Show
channel.description: Eclectic internet talk show featuring interviews with interesting and unusual people.
channel.copyright: 2010 The Basement Internet Show. Licensed to the public under http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/us/

item.title: Interview: Nick Scipio, Erotica Author
item.description: An interview with internet erotica author Nick Scipio, who discusses his popular Summer Camp series.

item.title: Sermon: Rev. Dr. Davidson Loehr, "The Original Christmas Story"
item.description: "The Original Christmas Story", as told by the Rev. Dr. Davidson Loehr of the First UU Church of Austin.

item.title: Interview: Veronica Monet, Escort and Public Speaker
item.description: A freewheeling interview with escort and public speaker Veronica Monet about sex, politics, religion, and more!

item.title: Interview: Dale Kaczmarek, Ghost Research Society
item.description: An interview with Dale Kaczmarek, President of the Ghost Research Society, who discusses a number of ghost related topics such as their origins, and how ghost activity can be detected using modern technology.

item.title: Interview: Shannon O'Kelley White, The Minx Show
item.description: An interview with Shannon O'Kelley White, former co-host of the Pseudo show Minx, who discusses a variety of topics including the end of Pseudo, the Minx show, looking for a job, and Howard Stern.

item.title: Interview: John Selig, Stop Dr. Laura
item.description: An interview with John Selig, a represenitive of the Stop Dr. Laura campaign, who discusses his group's opposition to talk show host Laura Schlessinger. Mr. Selig also discusses problems facing gay and lesbian teens.

item.title: Variety: Jello Biafra at H2K, Tim Henson on Napster, and Dr. Ducky
item.description: Eric Rosenfield interviews music and spoken word artist Jello Biafra at H2K, Tim Henson gives his commentary on the Napster debate, and Dr. Ducky provides some auditory stimulation.

item.title: Interview: Agent Salmonberry, Biotic Baking Brigade
item.description: An interview with Agent Salmonberry of the Biotic Baking Brigade concerning their efforts to bring attention to important social issues via pie projectile!

item.title: Interview: Godfrey, Mojave Desert Phone Booth
item.description: An interview with Godfrey concerning his now famous Mojave Desert Phone Booth adventures, the government, starting your own country, and more!

item.title: Interview: Isaac Bonewits, Paganism and Halloween
item.description: An interview with pagan author and former Archdruid Isaac Bonewits concerning the real origins of Halloween. He also discusses witchcraft, and his brief youthful involvement with the Church of Satan!

item.title: Interview: "Veronica", Threesomes and Internet Dating
item.description: An interview with "Veronica" who talks about her adventures meeting couples for threesomes via the internet.
